overview: Something very different will happen today at an uptown beauty salon. Customers and stylists alike are about to experience The Big Thrill. It seems that sexual frenzy is a secret side effect to a new baldness medication, and as luck would have it, some of the delicious stuff gets into the coffee supply. Suddenly nonstop sexual insanity breaks out. Clip-jobs and blow-dries take on new meanings in this all-star sex comedy.
title: The Big Thrill
